title: Leeds United Live: Cardiff 0-2 Leeds - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as leeds united take on cardiff in the championship .
doukara scores to put leeds in front .
cardiff down to ten men after fabio sent off .
evans makes four changes to side that beat bolton .
leeds won first league game since 23 january on saturday against bolton .

documents.title: good eveningcardiff 0-2 leeds
text: it 's taken 32 years but leeds have registered a win away at cardiff , and they 've done the double over the promotion hopefuls .
you can listen to our post-match interview with steve evans here .
we 'll be back on saturday to see if leeds can make it three in three when they face blackburn in the early kick-off .
thank you very much for joining us , and enjoy your evening .

documents.title: elsewhere in the championshipcardiff 0-2 leeds

burnley extended their lead at the top of the table with a 3-2 victory away at fulham , while ipswich threw away a two goal lead to draw 2-2 at bolton .

they did it with purpose .

he 's made some world class saves and he 's had such an important role in this result .

Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: popey on tonight 's performancecardiff 0-2 leeds
text: i did n't expect to win today - at best i thought a point .
steve evans and paul raynor are celebrating .
there 's emotion there , and a little bit of `` we told you we could win . ''
all you heard tonight was marching on together at the stadium and that 's all you 'll hear on the way home .
it 's been a long time coming and it just makes everything seem so much better .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: noel on today 's wincardiff 0-2 leeds
text: you look at every single player this evening and they put a real shift it .
it was a hearty performance and one that we expect and love to see .
they 've come here , frustrated them for 90 minutes - yes they 've rode their luck but they 've had a top quality goalkeeper .
some of the saves he made tonight were unreal .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time : cardiff 0-2 leeds
text: that 's leeds united 's first victory away at cardiff since 1984 , and back-to-back victories for steve evans and his side .
marco silvestri was sensational in goal , and despite a scrappy second-half , leeds have done well to register a win .
get your thoughts coming in to us , leeds fans , by tweeting us @ twitterid

documents.title: breakinggoal antenucci : cardiff 0-2 leeds
text: not the prettiest build up but it does n't matter , leeds have got the second .
great finish by mirco antenucci , who came driving down the left , into the penalty box and slipped it past david marshall as casual as you like .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: a free-kick for cardiff in a very dangerous area , but the wall does its job to deny craig noone and give marco silvestri a break from whipping out another cracking save .
leeds need to hold on for another few minutes .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: david marshall decides to show marco silvestri what he can do with a blinder of a save to tip giuseppe bellusci 's effort over the bar .
six minutes of extra time ahead .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: craig noone swings the ball in , it hits the post and kenneth zohore somehow manages to volley it into the bar .
leeds have got away with that !

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: another cracking save from marco silvestri , this time to craig noone 's fine effort that swung over the wall but went low down to silvestri .
silvestri parried it out and giuseppe bellusci was there to clear it .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: another change for leeds , as goalscorer souleymane doukara is replaced by lee erwin .
he gets boos from the home crowd and applause from the travelling section as he takes his time getting off the pitch .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: it 's definitely nearing the end of the game as giuseppe bellusci goes down with cramp and gets a round of boos from the cardiff fans for the theatrics .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: last substitution for cardiff , as kenneth zohore replaces stuart o'keefe .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: marco silvestri is in the action again , punching away craig noone 's shot , before bruno manga heads the ball over the bar .
it 's been an entertaining half , with plenty of action from either side .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: marco silvestri has earned his fee tonight , as he punches the ball away from his face and mirco antenucci goes racing back up the pitch .
it breaks for toumani diagouraga , but cardiff manage to clear .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: a change for either side , as sammy ameobi comes on for tom lawrence and stuart dallas replaces alex mowatt .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: marco silvestri really is excellent at that low down , diving save thing as he clings on to yet another shot from joe ralls .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: huge appeal from leeds for a handball as charlie taylor attempts to head the ball in at the back post , but the referee says no dice .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: and there is the change for leeds , as toumani diagouraga replaces liam bridcutt .
that 's the right move from steve evans , after bridcutt ham-fisted a few challenges .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: good free-kick from cardiff that slides through sol bamba 's legs but hammers into the post , rather than the back of the net .
leeds are n't clearing their lines at the minute .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: liam bridcutt brings down tom lawrence - he 's already on a yellow - but the referee awards a free-kick .
toumani diagouraga is warming up on the sidelines .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: leeds make a mess of a goal kick before marco silvestri has to pull out another one of those low saves to deny anthony pilkington .
it 's getting a little tense out there .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: the ref must be getting arm ache from whipping out cards , as gaetano berardi gets a yellow this time for a foul on tom lawrence .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: cardiff are down to ten men !
that 's two yellows for fabio as he slides through the back of charlie taylor ; sol bamba keeps his players away as the ref shows him a red card .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: the first change of the match , as paul whittingham makes way for craig noone .
there 's a yellow for alex mowatt as well as he takes out fabio .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: lewis cook and mirco antenucci combine to win the ball back , and antenucci ends his run with a lovely ball across the six yard box that has no-one there to meet it .
all getting a bit tense out there .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: bit of a pause while everyone in the dugouts gets a talking to .
the referee speaks to both managers , before souleymane doukara gives away a free-kick on the halfway line .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: there 's a penalty claim from cardiff for a giuseppe bellusci handball , the fourth official is splitting up paul raynor and his opposite number in the tunnel and it 's all getting a bit testy .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: a cardiff corner turns into a leeds break , before fabio is booked as he wipes out an advancing mirco antenucci .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: peter whittingham takes yet another cardiff corner and marco silvestri punches it out , before stuart o'keefe volleys the rebound over the bar .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: another fine save from marco silvestri as lex immers hammers a shot towards goal and silvestri is once again down low , at full stretch , to deflect it away .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: a lovely inside flick from souleymane doukara has lewis cook driving forward , before alex mowatt chips his shot a shade too far .
this is really good from leeds but cardiff are very quick on the counter , and marco silvestri has to punch away tom lawrence 's effort .

documents.title: more from noelcardiff 0-1 leeds
text: cardiff have n't done a great deal wrong .
they 've worked the ball into area and asked questions of marco silvestri .
the goal was the one area where they were weak .
they let leeds run pretty much unmarked .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: how will you remember this season ? cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: a mixed bag is probably the fairest , and politest , way to describe this season for leeds .
they 've lost sam byram and that horrendous defeat at brighton will stick in a few minds - but in between there 's been moments of genuinely exciting stuff .
lewie coyle 's emergence has to be a huge positive , as has the performances of lewis cook and alex mowatt at times .
however , with 13 points and 11 places between leeds and the final play-off position , it has to go down as another season where much was promised and little was achieved .

documents.title: noel on the first halfcardiff 0-1 leeds
text: we know when silvestri is called upon , he can do it .
his shot stopping is some of the best .
my question is : is he strong enough to command his area ?
he 's shown that tonight with a good , strong hand when he has people around him .
you have to react and be expecting the keeper to make a mistake .
sol bamba has been good in that area tonight .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half time : cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: souleymane doukara 's fifth goal of the season has put leeds in front , but there were some real danger signs in the last few minutes as they switched off .
a decent first half though ; cardiff have had most of the ball but leeds have got the goal .
it 's normally been the other way around for leeds this season .
get your thoughts coming in to us @ twitterid

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: a minute of added time as cardiff win yet another corner , but marco silvestri parries this one back out .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: leeds do switch off when they score a goal and anthony pilkington nearly makes them pay for it .
it 's another low shot but some good defending from sol bamba knocks it away for a corner .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: leeds need to keep their heads as they are forced onto the back foot by lex immers .
he loops his shot in but it slides just wide of the near post .

documents.title: cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: it was a great break from mirco antenucci to get that goal , but cardiff 's defence were absolutely nowhere .
they let him pass through to souleymane doukara pretty much unchallenged .
good movement from leeds , not so good from cardiff .

documents.title: breakinggoal doukara : cardiff 0-1 leeds
text: leeds are in front away from home !
from a fantastic counter-attack !
it 's been too long since i 've been able to type that .
it was a great effort to clear cardiff 's corner , before mirco antenucci it up and charged at scott malone .
malone could do nothing as antenucci slid through to doukara , who taps it in from 12 yards .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: that poor pass from lewis cook so nearly cost leeds as the ball drops to fabio , who is in acres of space .
he pulls it back to tom lawrence who slams it in to goal but another great save from marco silvestri denies him .
it 's a corner for cardiff though .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: cardiff come charging through to the edge of the penalty area , but sol bamba 's knees are in the right place as he deflects it to lewis cook .
cook comes charging back up the pitch but it 's another poor pass and cardiff win it back .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: leeds are holding their own here and the defence are doing well , right up until the moment when cardiff break up the pitch .
luke murphy does well to head it away from danger before leeds break .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: this is good from marco silvestri as he saves yet another attempt from tom lawrence , but leeds are getting caught ball-watching .
paul raynor is doing his best arm movements on the sidelines to get them to wake up .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: cardiff string their passes together in a much more organised way than leeds , as fabio helps them win back-to-back corners .
peter whittingham bumps it in at the back post , and there 's heads everywhere before marco silvestri pats it away .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: peter whittingham lines up the free-kick , goes for goal and a cracking save from marco silvestri denies him .
full-stretch to the near post and silvestri gets a good , strong hand to turn it away for a corner .

text: that 's a telling off for luke murphy for a tug on tom lawrence , and a free-kick for cardiff from 25 yards out .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: leeds are seeing enough of the ball but their passing has been poor ; not helped by a slippery surface but there 's been some weak efforts in midfield .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: good work from giuseppe bellusci ends another cardiff threat as tom lawrence sells alex mowatt the dummy before curling in a cross that bellusci edges behind .
cardiff crowd marco silvestri for the corner but he covers peter whittingham 's attempt .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: cardiff have probably had the better of the opening half but they ca n't get their shots right , as stuart o'keefe slashes a volley into the side netting .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: mirco antenucci does really well to turn and keep the ball under control , but does the easy bit badly as he shanks his pass to alex mowatt and cardiff intercept .
oops .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: cardiff break back up the other end and fabio crosses it in , but it 's a looping header from anthony pilkington and it 's easily held by marco silvestri .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: that 's the first yellow of the game as souleymane doukara tries to round matthew connolly and connolly brings him down .
alex mowatt takes the free-kick and it lands nicely in the box , but sol bamba slices it over the bar .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: lewis cook takes leeds ' first corner of the game , but david marshall collects it high above his head and gets it away down the left .
a fine tackle from liam bridcutt ends da silva 's run , but it 's all a bit scrappy at the minute .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: anthony pilkington up a cross and heads it towards goal , but it 's an easy save for marco silvestri and leeds have to go again .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: it 's a pretty sloppy opening for leeds , as souleymane doukara loses the ball in midfield and cardiff break off the back .
they win a corner , which they bend it but a strong header from luke murphy knocks it away .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: sol bamba looks to turn but slips and loses the ball .
anthony pilkington is as quick as you like down the pitch but smashes his shot over the bar .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: it 's a skiddy surface thanks to some rain earlier today , which helps with some slick passing as luke murphy loses and then wins the ball straight back .

documents.title: cardiff 0-0 leeds
text: and , despite noel 's best efforts to ruin our kit , they 're off , with leeds going right to left .

documents.title: one minute to gocardiff v leeds
text: the teams are out in a very cold cardiff ; it 's 4-1-3-2-1 tonight for the whites .
it ca n't get any worse than the last time they played on a tuesday night , right ?

documents.title: noel 's pre-game chat with steve evanscardiff v leeds
text: steve seems good - he knew last week was n't good enough .
he said he had people in the dressing room who had their heads down , and that 's not what he needs .
he needs fighters and people who have that fight .
steve knows that the fans deserve more , from the players and from this season .
he 's just hoping they can finish off with a flourish .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: last time outcardiff v leeds
text: alex mowatt 's strike was the difference when these two sides last met in november at elland road .
his brilliant , long-range effort broke the deadlock after 63 minutes , in a game which neither side really got to grips with .
it did however give steve evans his first win as leeds manager - and give leeds fans their first home victory since 4 march .

documents.title: noel 's two cents on tonight 's teamcardiff v leeds
text: i 've been talking to steve and he 's going for a positive team .
he wanted to have some creativity and really have a go at them .
murphy is a little more attacking than diagouraga and he has a better range of passing , and with mowatt and cook out there , it is a more attacking midfield .
they 've had a six hour journey here and they did n't think it would do chris wood any good .
hopefully he 'll be fit for blackburn .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: eye on the oppositioncardiff v leeds
text: cardiff have n't lost a game at home since 15 september , and that was against promotion candidates hull .
they are outside the top six only on goal difference and , after a post-christmas wobble , have won three of their last five outings .
leeds also do n't have the happiest of records against cardiff - they have n't won away at cardiff since 1984 , managing just two draws in 17 games .
there is one bright spark for leeds fans , however small : leeds have won more points from losing positions on the road than any other championship team .
not quite clutching at straws territory , but nearly !

documents.title: view from the boxcardiff v leeds
text: cardiff v leeds united an hour to go before kick off looking for back to back wins mot
@ twitterid brilliant commentary .
made my week get inn seahorse

documents.title: `` our supporters had waited too long for that winning feeling '' cardiff v leeds
text: saturday was leeds ' first league victory since 23 january - in between wins , they were knocked out of the fa cup by watford in february .
`` i look in before i look out and i had to win a match , '' steve evans said .
`` we 've been unfortunate not to do so on a number of occasions recently .
`` the players stood up like the men i know they are .
the way they bounced back has been noticed by a lot of supporters .
`` our supporters had waited too long to go home on a saturday night with that winning feeling and we were fortunate enough and good enough to get that for them . ''

documents.title: `` we can finish in the top ten '' cardiff v leeds
text: despite the fact they have n't been there all season , steve evans still thinks his leeds united side can challenge for a top ten place .
`` my target was the top ten back when i came in and a lot of people thought it was impossible .
i still think we can , '' evans said .
`` we 've got players who can win some football matches .
we 've proven we can beat anyone in the division .
`` it 's a tough league with the finest of margins .
there will always be the odd bad performance for everyone , but it 's how you react to them . ''

documents.title: popey on tonight 's teamcardiff v leeds
text: there are three wingers on the bench but it 's a 4-1-3-2-1 formation .
there is no natural width there and where will antenucci and doukara get that supply from ?
i wonder if he 's going to start with this , see if they can hold on and then introduce someone from the bench .
the lack of width is a concern but it might match up to cardiff .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: breakingteam newscardiff v leeds
text: as expected , steve evans has made changes to the side that beat bolton on saturday .
lewie coyle and liam cooper both up knocks and are replaced by gaetano berardi and sol bamba , while luke murphy and alex mowatt fill in for toumani diagouraga and mustapha carayol .
leeds united xi : silvestri , berardi , bamba , bellusci , taylor , murphy , bridcutt , mowatt , cook , antenucci , doukara .
cardiff city xi : marshall , fabio , connolly , manga , malone , lawrence , o'keefe , ralls , whittingham , pilkington , immers .

documents.title: two from two ? cardiff v leeds
text: good evening , and welcome to tonight 's live text commentary of cardiff v leeds .
saturday brought a much needed win for united , not least for manager steve evans , as they registered a convincing-ish victory over bolton .
it was another game kicked off by protests against owner massimo cellino , but on the pitch leeds will be hoping to build on saturday 's success .
keep an eye on us here while you enjoy our coverage on 92.4 fm and freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can make it two wins from two - something they 've managed just three times this season .
